OOC: Damnit!  Robert Dahl, where'd ya go?  I could use a little backup here!
I just ran into Maximal territory!!!

::Triggerhappy/Symphony::

       Triggerhappy is hit in the side by the two missiles, and goes
spiraling down.  He gets hit by 3 of the laserbolts, 2 of them missing him
as he spiraled down.  He crashed onto the grohnd, and slid.  Just then,
Symphony came running out.  He ran over to Triggerhappy.

       "Ya got him Prowl!" He yelled up.

        Then, Triggerhappy transformed into robot mode.  He shot one power
shot at Symphony from his compressed air cannon(Blowpipe) and Symphony went
flying back.

        "I'M NOT A WEAKLING!!!!!!!!!!" He yelled.

         Symphony pulled out his machine gun, and started pumping
Triggerhappy full of 25 shots of led.

          "THIS MEANS WAR!!!" Triggerhappy gave a battlecry.

            Triggerhappy kicked away Symphony, and then shot 2 shots from
Blowpipe up in the air at Prowl, then one at Firearm.
